fieldDescription: Enables access to D-MOD service centers in [Size 6+ markets]. Disable this if your main market menu is getting too cluttered due to other mods, or if you do not plan on using the services during this playthrough.
Cost multiplier for adding a selected D-Mod to a ship.
Adding a D-Mod through 'Select a D-Mod' option also [applies the 'Unrestorable' tag] to the selected ship, preventing any D-Mod removal from either dockyard restoration or the Hull Restoration skill.
Adds the option of fully-automating your ships while visiting a D-MOD service center, but [only if you have discovered and defeated a certain defender fleet].
